meanings.definition: The state of being different from the norm or from what is considered usual.
meanings.sent1: The alterities in her artwork made it stand out from the rest.
meanings.sent2: The alterities in opinions can lead to interesting discussions.
meanings.sent3: The alterities in their fashion choices always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: The alterities in nature's patterns are a beautiful sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The alterities in flavors made the dish unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being other or different; a diversity or variation in character or quality.
meanings.sent1: The alterities in their personalities complement each other perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The alterities in cultures enrich our understanding of the world.
meanings.sent3: The alterities in their music taste always lead to fun debates.
meanings.sent4: The alterities in their friendship create a strong bond.
meanings.sent5: The alterities in their teaching styles cater to all students' needs.
